name: All Hands!
description:
Download if possible, the audio is better! <3

All Hands! is a local co-op game in which two players find themselves manning a rapidly-deteriorating spaceship amidst a sea of asteroids. Players can control either the stalwart pilot, dodging and blasting incoming asteroids while picking up resources left behind by lesser-fortunate space vessels, or the persistent engineer, repairing malfunctioning ship systems while refilling fuel and ammunition with retrieved resources. Players must remain vigilant and work to one another’s benefit, lest your souls become bound to the vacuum for the rest of eternity. Plus, if you make it far enough, there's a sick guitar solo.

Pilot Controls:

  • Mouse (Ship movement direction)
  • Mouse Button 1 (Fire ship blasters)
  • Mouse Button 2 (Elevator control)

Pilot Objectives: 

  • Dodge or blast incoming dangers
  • Pick up (run into) incoming fuel and ammo crates 
  • Activate elevator to allow engineer to move between floors

Engineer Controls:

  • A + D (lLeft + Right movement)
  • W (Jump)
  • F (Wrench Whack)
  • E (Pick Up/Throw)
  • Left Shift (Sprint)

Engineer Objectives:

  • Repair (whack) ship thrusters (red arrows)
  • Repair (whack) navigation control systems
  • Pick up retrieved resources and deliver to fuel tank (circle port next to thrusters) or ammo hopper (big green box in ammo room)
